summary: The diff shows only a modification to project_state.json metadata file, which updates project tracking information. There is no evidence of actual code restoration to Version 3 state. The requirement REQ-2 to restore all backend and frontend code files to their exact Version 3 state appears completely unimplemented.

missing_requirements.requirement: Restore all backend and frontend code files to their exact state as they existed in Version 3 draft
missing_requirements.reason: The diff only shows a metadata file update (project_state.json). No backend or frontend code files were modified, added, or removed to restore the Version 3 state. A restoration would require modifying multiple source code files.
